about.3rabitk1: 3arbitk is a mobile app specialized in the buying and selling of car spare parts and accessories across Egypt. We provide a smart digital solution that helps you find the parts you need quickly and easily — whether you’re a car owner or a trader looking to expand your business.
about.3rabitk2: The app offers a smart search system where you can find your part by car make, model, or even by uploading a photo of the part. If you can’t find what you’re looking for, you can submit a custom request — and we’ll connect it with verified suppliers in our network to get it to you fast.
about.3rabitk3: All listed products come with clear photos and prices. You can communicate directly with the seller or through our delivery agents. Our support team is also available to assist you with any inquiries.
about.3rabitk4: If the product you receive is not as described or has an issue, you can return it within 14 days from the delivery date. The product must be in its original condition with proof of purchase. We guarantee a safe and hassle-free shopping experience.

about.To become the leading choice in Egypt an: To become the leading choice in Egypt and the region for delivering comprehensive solutions in the automotive spare parts sector, by offering reliable and fast services tailored to every car owner’s needs.

Contact.Technical support on demand If you need: Technical support on demand. If you need help choosing the right part, our team is ready to assist you.
